article: How to Fix Dough That Won't Rise
intro: You have it all planned: the dinner, the wine, that fresh-baked loaf of bread. Everything's coming together when you discover that your bread dough just isn't

points.name: Why Isnâ€™t My Bread Rising? The Top 7 Reasons

steps.title: Check your added ingredients.
steps.subtitle: Some spices, such as cinnamon, are naturally antifungal. Those antifungal ingredients can kill your yeast!
sub-points: For sweet fruit buns or cinnamon rolls, you usually want a fast rise, as the cinnamon will eventually kill the yeast off.

Some dried fruits also are coated with antifungals as a preservative. Organic  are expensive but much better for baking. What many bakers do is use standard dried fruit but don't add it till the final proofing.
